text:
YouTube Star Lilly Singh & Ranveer Singh Rap To 'Apna Time Aayega' And It's Everything!
YouTube Star Lilly Singh & Ranveer Singh Rap To 'Apna Time Aayega' And It's Everything!
What happens when two powerhouses of talent come together? Well, the results are phenomenal and that's exactly what happened at the GQ Style Awards in Mumbai last night.
After winning the hearts of the audience with his rapping skills in Zoya Akhtar's blockbuster Gully Boy, Ranveer Singh was in his full elements last night, as he rapped his way to glory with YouTube star Lilly Singh aka Superwoman.
The GQ event was attended by a lot of Bollywood stars including Anushka Sharma, Jacqueline Fernandez, Jim Sarbh, Taapsee Pannu, Kalki Koechlin, Fatima Sana Shaikh, and Sanya Malhotra.
But what caught everyone's heart and attention was when Ranveer Singh and Lilly Singh took over the stage to entertain the audience.
Screengrab
The jugalbandi between the two Singhs received a lot of adulation and love and that says everything! Watch the video right here.
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
Lilly Singh is in Mumbai currently for her massive YTFF( Youtube Fab Fest) show. Apart from that, both Ranveer and Lilly were in news recently for different, yet relevant reasons.
While Ranveer announced launched independent music label IncInk, Lilly dropped her new single two days ago, which went viral in no time.
title: YouTube Star Lilly Singh & Ranveer Singh Rap To 'Apna Time Aayega' And It's Everything!
